detail_desc: Jacket in a cotton weave with an embroidered motif at the top, a sailor collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal front pockets and a decorative tab and button at the cuffs. Lined.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Jacket in nylon with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, chest pockets, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with decorative bows on the shoulder straps. Print motif and tulle pompoms on the front.
Draped nursing blouse in patterned satin with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a contrasting colour pompom trim down the sides.

Sturdy nylon boots with imitation suede details and a high shaft with a padded scuba edge and a mesh and scuba tongue. Lacing with quick-lace hooks at the front, a zip at the side and loop at the back. Rubber trim around the sole. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
3/4-length leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Shirt in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton with a zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.
Calf-length, fitted lace skirt with a concealed zip at the back and raw-edge scalloped hem. Lined.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill at the top and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows. Lined at the front.
Pyjama top and shorts in printed cotton-blend jersey. Round-necked vest top and short shorts with an elasticated waist.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Short shorts in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist and side pockets.
Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, wide flounce at the top and straight, wide legs.
Kimono in crushed velvet with a detachable tie belt, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with faceted glass beads. Adjustable length, 60-68 cm.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Front pockets and elasticated hems. Loose fit.
Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back. Perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments or garments with a low-cut back.

Maxi dress in soft jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut neckline at the back. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long, pleated, heavily draping skirt. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Derby shoes with decorative welt seams and open lacing at the front. Rubber soles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with side pockets and straight, wide ankle-length legs. Wide, elasticated jersey panel at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Zipped front pockets with taped seams, ribbed cuffs and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Slip-on trainers in patterned cotton canvas with a padded top edge, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.

prod_name: D Begonia Denim shorts x EQ
detail_desc: Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with worn details, decorative metal studs on the front, a zip fly with a button, and raw-edge hems.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Scarf in an airy, patterned cotton weave that can also be tied as a hairband or around the neck. Size 60x60 cm.
Dress in crinkled jersey with a square neckline, elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves with an overlocked frill trim. Seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a shaped neckline and flounces at the top that continue back over the shoulders. Concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist with pleats and ties that fasten at the back. Gently flared peplum. Partly lined.

Single-breasted jacket in superstretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap, and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit, airy wool blend in a wider, slightly longer style. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with a square neckline front and back and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves.
Trousers in a soft weave. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, front pockets, a fake back pocket, and tapered legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh panels on the legs, wide elastication at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings, an all-in-one suit, a T-shirt and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with a wide foldover waistband, elasticated heels and full feet. All-in-one suit with an all-over print, press-studs down the front and at the crotch, elasticated heels and full feet. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a round, ribbed neckline decorated with faceted sparkly stones, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Double-breasted, ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and diagonal side pockets. Seam at the waist, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems. Unlined.

Block-coloured windbreaker in woven fabric with a high collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative buttons on the shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short, 5-pocket denim shorts with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge, frayed hems.

Padded parka with a soft finish, a pile-lined, detachable hood with a faux fur trim, and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener and zip down the front. Fake top pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and fastener, and knitted ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back with a single back vent. Lined.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. Dropped shoulders, long, voluminous balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar and button placket, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a tie detail, and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front with a chin guard, a fake flap pocket on the tummy, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining.

Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Two high slits at the front, one with a decorative print. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered, elasticated frill around the neckline and armholes.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt and jersey-lined trousers in a cotton weave. Shirt with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, patch front pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Detachable elastic braces that can be adjusted with a button.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Plastic Alice band covered with glittery imitation leather and grosgrain along the inside. Butterfly-shaped chiffon and tulle appliqués on top.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a hood, print motif, seam at the hips and gently flared skirt.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, printed jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Short, padded jacket with a jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with pin-tucks at the top and a V-neck with a drawstring at the neckline. Seam at the waist with a drawstring and a pleated, draped skirt. Unlined.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in soft fleece with an elasticated waist and hems.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: DeLuca pull on TVP RW TVP
detail_desc: Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.

Knee-length skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and wide, detachable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Buttons down the front and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Unlined.
